entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 11:50 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
